title: Support emails not being recieved
body: Both the recover password and recover username emails do not get sent to my other accounts email. I know that I am entering the right email because i have emails saved from requesting before. However when I do the recover password/username with this account, I get the email immediately. It has always been this way with this account and support tickets take way too long to use just to reset a password. Basically the email pass/user recovery works for one account but not the other.

replies.body:
Can you ensure the right email is associated with the account you're trying to recover? You can do so in the [account management panel.](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect)

Let me know if you have any questions.
